        <h1>All Seasons</h1>

    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-8 col-lg-8">
                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1921">Season 1921</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1921E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4701680">
                                    Cleaning Up!!?	
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>March 20, 1921</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>The first film produced by Laugh-O-Gram Studio as part of demo reel. This film consists of Walt drawing a single-frame picture of the life in Kansas City, and is the first Disney Short ever.
</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4701680">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4701680.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1921E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4701681">
                                    Kansas City Girls Are Rolling Their Own Now	
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>March 20, 1921</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Walt Disney&#039;s second drawing of a single-frame picture of the life in Kansas City.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4701681">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4701681.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1921E03</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4701682">
                                    Did You Ever Take a Ride Over Kansas City Street &#039;in a Fliver&#039;	
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>March 20, 1921</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Walt Disney&#039;s third drawing of a single-frame picture of the life in Kansas City.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4701682">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4701682.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1921E04</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4701683">
                                    Kansas City&#039;s Spring Clean-Up
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>March 20, 1921</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>The first properly animated film produced by Laugh-O-Gram Studio; this film was part of a demo reel and it&#039;s a Walt Disney&#039;s hand drawing of a single-frame picture of local law enforcement cleaning up Kansas City.
</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4701683">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4701683.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                    
                                    </ul>
                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1922">Season 1922</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1922E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569951">
                                    Little Red Riding Hood
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>July 29, 1922</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>The traditional story of the little girl bringing treats to her grandma (in this case donuts with shotgun-created holes) with the &quot;wolf&quot; as a dapper gentleman in a flivver and her rescuer a passing aviator.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569951">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4569951.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1922E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569952">
                                    The Four Musicians of Bremen
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>August 1, 1922</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>The four animal musicians take up arms and defeat a town who doesn&#039;t care for their presence.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569952">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/series/78988/episodes/5ea6d954e8c36.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1922E03</span>

                                    Jack and the Beanstalk
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>September 4, 1922</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>A Laugh-O-Gram cartoon based on the story of Jack and the Beanstalk.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1922E04</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569954">
                                    Jack the Giant Killer
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>September 12, 1922</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Laugh-O-Gram short, a transposition of the Jack the Giant Killer fairy tale.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569954">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/series/78988/episodes/5ea6e35b85dd2.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1922E05</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569953">
                                    Goldie Locks and the Three Bears
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>October 5, 1922</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Laugh-O-Gram cartoon based on the classic story of Goldilocks and the Three Bears.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569953">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/series/78988/episodes/5ea6dbd2a033c.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1922E06</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569956">
                                    Puss in Boots
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>November 3, 1922</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>A boy and his cat, Puss in Boots, visit the princess in her backyard. The king, however, catches the boy flirting with his daughter and kicks him out. The boy&#039;s cat- inspired by seeing &quot;Rodolph Vaselino&quot; in a film-within-a-film, &quot;Throwing The Bull&quot;- comes up with a way to win His Majesty&#039;s favor. The boy decides to fight the bull at his local arena, where the king and his daughter are watching. The boy (who is wearing a mask) becomes a seemingly expert bullfighter, while the cat secretly knocks out the bull with a remote-control &quot;radio hypnotizer&quot;. After the boy wins the bullfight, the king says that he can marry his daughter. As soon as the boy removes his mask, the king runs after the pair, who escape in a car.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1922E07</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569958">
                                    Cinderella
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>December 6, 1922</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>This short is the traditional story with Cinderella as a 1920&#039;s flapper.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569958">

                        </li>

                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1923">Season 1923</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1923E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569962">
                                    Alice&#039;s Wonderland
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>May 16, 1923</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Alice visits Disney&#039;s cartoon studio where the cartoons jump off the page. Later on, she sleeps and dreams that she has gone to Cartoonland where she is able to interact with the cartoon characters. This is the first Alice short.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569962">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4569962.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>

                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1924">Season 1924</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1924E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569965">
                                    Alice&#039;s Day at Sea
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>March 1, 1924</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Alice is entranced by an old sailor&#039;s stories of surviving a shipwreck which inspires a dream of her visiting the denizens of an underwater zoo.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569965">

                                    Alice&#039;s Spooky Adventure
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>April 1, 1924</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Alice enters an abandoned house to retrieve a lost baseball and is knocked out. She dreams she is visiting a town called &quot;Spookville&quot; where she is chased by ghosts.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4569966">

                                    Alice&#039;s Wild West Show
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>May 1, 1924</li>
                                                                                                                                    <li>Syndication</li>
                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Alice and her friends put on a Wild West Show for the neighborhood kids where she regales the audience with her tales of cowboys and Indians.</p>
                                    </div>

                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1930">Season 1930</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1930E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570690">
                                    Minnie&#039;s Yoo Hoo
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>January 1, 1930</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">

                        <li class="list-group-item">

                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1930E21</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570714">
                                    Playful Pan
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>December 27, 1930</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>The God Pan flits through the fields, coaxing music and dance out of the flora and fauna, who cooperate well. Maybe too well when a dancing thundercloud bumps together, producing a lightning strike that threatens to burn everything down. Fortunately, Pan&#039;s musical charms are able to lure the flames into a nearby pond where they are safely extinguished.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570714">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4570714.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                    
                                    </ul>
                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1931">Season 1931</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1931E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570767">
                                    The Birthday Party
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>January 7, 1931</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Minnie, Horace, and Clarabelle join hordes of others for a big birthday celebration. Mickey and Minnie jam on &quot;I Can&#039;t Give You Anything But Love, Baby,&quot; then Horace and Clarabelle perform a dance and some scat-singing to &quot;Darktown Strutters&#039; Ball.&quot;</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570767">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4570767.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1931E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570768">
                                    Birds of a Feather
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>February 3, 1931</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">

                                    </ul>
                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1932">Season 1932</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1932E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570886">
                                    The Bird Store
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>January 16, 1932</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>An idyllic recital at the titular establishment is disrupted by the untimely arrival of a hungry alley cat.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570886">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4570886.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1932E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570887">
                                    The Duck Hunt
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>January 28, 1932</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Mickey and Pluto go duck hunting, stopping to jam to &quot;Columbia, Gem of the Ocean.&quot; The ducks get their own back, carrying the hunters through the air and dropping them on a clothesline.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570887">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4570887.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>

                                    Parade of the Award Nominees
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>November 18, 1932</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">

In order they were Wallace Beery for &quot;The Champ&quot; (with Jackie Cooper trailing along behind), Alfred Lunt and Lynn Fontanne for &quot;The Guardsman&quot;, Helen Hayes for &quot;The Sins of Madelon Claudet&quot;, Fredric March for &quot;Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde&quot;, and Marie Dressler for &quot;Emma.&quot;</p>

                                    </ul>
                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1933">Season 1933</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1933E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4570931">
                                    Building a Building
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>January 7, 1933</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Mickey saves box-lunch-seller Minnie from Pete, who&#039;s boss on a construction site.</p>
                                    </div>

                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">

                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4525029">

They wish to play tricks on the mortals. And they do through a series of inventive gags, but by the end the trio has managed to scare the ghosts out of the house when flour accidentally spilled over the trio.</p>

                                        <p>Mickey, Donald, and Goofy construct the ship &quot;Queen Minnie&quot; from folding component parts. When Minnie launches the ship by hitting it with a champagne bottle, she whacks it so hard that, once out at sea, it separates into its parts again.</p>

                                                                                                        <li class="list-group-item list-group-item-special">
                                    <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                        <small class="text-muted episode-label">SPECIAL 0x5</small>
                                        <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4574680">
                                            The Sorcerer&#039;s Apprentice
                                        </a>
                                    </h4>
                                    <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                                    <li>November 13, 1940</li>
                                                                                                                                                            </ul>
                                    <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                        <div class="row">
                                            <div class="col-xs-9">
                                                <p>The Sorcerer&#039;s Apprentice is the third and most famous segment in Disney&#039;s Fantasia and is played again in Fantasia 2000. It stars Mickey Mouse. Although The Sorcerer&#039;s Apprentice was already a popular concert piece, it was brought to a much larger audience through its inclusion in the 1940 Walt Disney animated concert film Fantasia, in which Mickey Mouse plays the role of the apprentice. Disney had acquired the music rights in 1937 when he planned to release a separate Mickey Mouse film, which, at the suggestion of Leopold Stokowski, was eventually expanded into Fantasia.</p>
                                            </div>
                                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                                    <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4574680">
                                                        <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4574680.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                                    </a>
                                                </div>
                                                                                    </div>
                                    </div>
                                </li>
                                                    
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1940E13</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/300726">

                                </a>

                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">

                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1943E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/300742">
                                    Der Fuehrer&#039;s Face
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>January 1, 1943</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>A German &quot;&quot;oom-pah&quot;&quot; band parades through town extolling the &quot;&quot;virtues&quot;&quot; of the Fuehrer with the title song. They awaken Donald Duck who has to go to work in a Nazi munitions factory, much to his regret. Luckily in the end, after a frantic workday trying to alternate between making bombs and saluting Hitler, he finds that it has all been a nightmare and that he is still living the the good old U.S.A.

Der Fuehrer&#039;s Face won the 1942 Academy Award for Best Short Subjects: Cartoons.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/300742">

                                        <p>Lambert is a lion cub who is mis-delivered to a flock of sheep. Because he is different, he is ostracized by the rest of the lambs. But things change when he grows up and a wolf attacks the flock.</p>

The bee started helping Donald pick up trash, then using his sharp stinger to increase sales for balloon vendor Donald, then as a tattoo artist, and finally doing embroidery. After a particularly demanding tapestry, the bee asks for time off, and Donald shows him to a custom-built greenhouse. In there, along with lots of lovely flowers, and moreover, a lady bee. This obviously causes some problems in the relationship with Donald. </p>

Enter wandering cowboy Goofy who notices a pretty girl being held up in a stagecoach robbery by Pete. Lovestruck and completely oblivious to Pete, he foils the robbery while getting to know the girl better. This earns him a reputation as a great gunslinger and he is challenged to apprehend Pete. Pete tries to get his revenge on Goofy but every attempt backfires due to Goofy&#039;s clumsiness usually directed unintentionally at Pete.</p>

Eventually, she becomes old and hard to operate and her owner trades her in. Another man notices her and buys her but this men is considerably less genteel leaving her out in the cold and mistreating her. Much to her horror, she eventually discovers she is a stolen car and is chased by the police during which she is totalled in an accident. Now Susie is kept in a junkyard but, when all looks hopeless, another man notices her, buys her, gives her an overhaul, and has her back on the road in no time.</p>

After taking role call, Goofy tries to teach the class but keeps having to deal with a mischievous trouble-maker named George who enjoys sneaking out of class to go fishing, eating the teacher&#039;s apple, squeaking chalk, making faces while teacher gives a geography lesson, and terrorizing the other students with his water pistol. In the end, George&#039;s mischief goes too far when he destroys the school with an exploding bomb and is forced to write &quot;I will not bomb the school again&quot; 100 times!</p>

                                    </ul>
                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1953">Season 1953</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1953E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4571693">
                                    Father&#039;s Day Off
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>March 28, 1953</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Mrs. Goofy leaves for the day leaving the house in the hands of her husband, Goofy. Goofy is confident that he can handle the day&#039;s household chores but he keeps making typical goof-ups while attempting them. His first mistake is sending Junior to school on a Saturday. At first, he just makes small blunders but, of course, they keep escalating to the point where his house is flooded, scribbled on, set on fire, invaded by firemen and policemen alike, and, basically, an utter disaster area when the wife returns. </p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4571693">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4571693.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1953E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4571781">
                                    The Simple Things
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>April 18, 1953</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Mickey and Pluto go fishing. Pluto has a run-in with a clam, who eventually lodges in Pluto&#039;s mouth; Mickey thinks the clam is Pluto&#039;s tongue and can&#039;t understand why Pluto keeps begging for more food. After they get rid of the clam, Mickey&#039;s attempts to use his minnows as bait are thwarted by a hungry seagull; he brings his friends, and they chase our heroes away.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4571781">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4571781.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1953E03</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4571782">
                                    For Whom the Bulls Toil
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>May 9, 1953</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Goofy, driving through Mexico, deals with a stubborn bull on the road who eventually charges, and Goofy unwittingly subdues the bull. Mexicans who are watching the scene believe that Goofy is &quot;the great Matador&quot; and the minute Goofy arrives in Mexico City, they dress him like a matador and make him do battle with another bull. The reluctant Goofy tries to escape the enormous bull although after a while, once again, he triumphs over the bull by accident. </p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4571782">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4571782.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1953E04</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4948533">
                                    Melody
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>May 28, 1953</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>An owl teaches his class full of birds about melody. It&#039;s all around in nature. Only birds and man can sing; man &quot;sings&quot; even when he speaks. We see a quick survey of the stages of life, as captured by songs: the alphabet song for primary school, Here Comes the Bride, The Old Gray Mare, etc. Some inspirations for song are outlined in song: love, sailing, trains, the West, motherhood, etc., but &quot;we never sing about brains.&quot; Finally, an example of how a simple melody can be expanded into a symphony: an elaborate version of the simple tune that opened the lesson.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4948533">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4948533.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1953E05</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4571784">
                                    Don&#039;s Fountain of Youth
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>May 30, 1953</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>The boys are more interested in their comic book than the sights on their Florida vacation. When the car breaks down next to the spring &quot;mistaken for the fountain of youth&quot;, Donald decides to have some fun with his nephews and hides the part of the sign saying &quot;mistaken for&quot;. As baby Donald, he starts shredding their comic book and generally acting like a spoiled brat. But when he decides to pretend he&#039;s turned into an egg (borrowed from an alligator), he&#039;s in for trouble he hadn&#039;t bargained for once the gator finds out.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4571784">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4571784.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">

                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">

                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Goofy plays everyman again. He&#039;s an average working joe who demonstrates &quot;the up on time/work on time/bed on time&quot; routine while going from work to home every weekday. On Saturday night, however, he parties it up and attempts to get some rest the next Sunday but with his son around, it&#039;s impossible. He insists Dad take him to the beach and, although Goofy refuses, he ends up going anyway where he gets into all sorts of trouble mainly as the result of chasing his son all over the place. Worse yet, when he leaves, he falls victim to the world&#039;s biggest traffic jam. As a result of all this, he is relieved to go back to work the following week! </p>
                                    </div>

                                    Toot, Whistle, Plunk &amp; Boom
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>November 10, 1953</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>In this short subject (which mostly represents a departure from Disney&#039;s traditional approach to animation), a stuffy owl teacher lectures his feathered flock on the origins of Western musical instruments. Starting with cavepeople, whose crude implements could only &quot;toot, whistle, plunk and boom,&quot; the owl explains how these beginnings led to the development of the four basic types of Western musical instruments: brass, woodwinds, strings, and percussion.</p>
                                    </div>

                                            Two For The Record
                                        </a>
                                    </h4>
                                    <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                                    <li>April 23, 1954</li>
                                                                                                                                                            </ul>
                                    <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                        <div class="row">
                                            <div class="col-xs-9">
                                                <p>Two Benny Goodman songs are paired with animated sequences in this short film, originally created for Disney&#039;s &#039;Make Mine Music&#039;. In &quot;After You&#039;ve Gone&quot;, animated musical instruments dance along with a jazz tune in surreal settings. In &quot;All the Cats Join In&quot;, a group of teens go to the local malt shop and dance to a jazzy jukebox tune.</p>

He gets into a scrape with a customer, McMorehouse, who wants to pay 44 cents freight for two guinea pigs which he considers pets.                         <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1957E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4610901">
                                    The Story of Anyburg U.S.A.
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>June 19, 1957</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>The city of Anyburg decides its traffic situation has gotten out of hand, so it puts the automobile on trial. The trial (conducted in rhyme) starts with a car that was in a hit-and-run accident, followed by a sports car whose sins are peeling rubber and general hot-rodding, followed by a heap, on trial for lack of safety.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4610901">

                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">

                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1957E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4610902">
                                    The Truth About Mother Goose
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>August 28, 1957</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>We learn the true stories behind various nursery rhymes. Little Jack Horner: a servant to a city official was delivering a present to King Henry VIII, baked, as was the custom of the time, in a pie. The present was the deed to a valuable estate, which Horner stole.</p>

                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1961">Season 1961</a></h3>

                        <li class="list-group-item">

                                    Aquamania
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">

                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Goofy gets the boating bug, but doesn&#039;t expect to be in a water skiing race with an octopus.</p>

                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575724">

                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1961E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575725">
                                    The Saga of Windwagon Smith
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>March 16, 1961</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Windwagon Smith blows into town with a strange contraption: a conestoga wagon outfitted with a wind sail. The town fathers figure that since a small windwagon does so well, a big one must do better. They set out to build one (while Smith woos the mayor&#039;s daughter) and launch it on it&#039;s maiden voyage to very unexpected results.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575725">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4575725.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1961E03</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4576785">
                                    The Litterbug
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>June 21, 1961</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Donald and his nephews are litterbugs: they drop garbage everywhere they go - even when they are out for a drive in Donald&#039;s car - until they are stopped by a policeman who makes them pick up everything they have dropped. This was the last Donald Duck cartoon ever made.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4576785">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4576785.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1961E04</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4576786">
                                    Donald and the Wheel
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>June 21, 1961</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>A father tells his son the invention of the wheel was most important; to prove it, the two hipsters visit the inventor caveman Donald Duck. There follows a survey of the progress of transportation, a digression into the basics of gear ratios, a series of live-action dancers to various styles of music inside a giant jukebox, an illustration of the use of wheels in power generation and space satellites, etc. Ultimately, Donald decides he doesn&#039;t want the responsibility, but certainly someone else would take on the task.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4576786">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4576786.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>

Uses animation to illustrate the primitive steps of iron making with Donald Duck as the original iron master </p>

                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1992">Season 1992</a></h3>

                                    Off His Rockers
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">

                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">

                                    Petal to the Metal
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>August 7, 1992</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>In delivering a bouquet of flowers across town to a stunning starlet named Fawn Deer, a delirious delivery cat named Bonkers D. Bobcat turns a relatively easy assignment into a catalog of catastrophes. Racing against the clock to meet his five-minute delivery deadline, Bonkers encounters a wide array of ridiculous roadblocks, ranging from banana peels to the world&#039;s slowest taxi driver, in his frantic attempts to meet the deadline and keep his job.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>

Timon sings his own rendition of the hit song Stand By Me in the African fields. While he is singing, Pumbaa is hit by a ton of heavy objects such as safes and airplanes. </p>

                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/1997">Season 1997</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S1997E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575784">
                                    Redux Riding Hood
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>August 5, 1997</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>This is the story of the Wolf, who, having failed to get Little Red Riding Hood, obsesses over his failure to the point of ruining his life. The Wolf tries to get Little Red after hiding Grandma in a closet, only to be chased off by the Woodsman. The next morning he is caught daydreaming aqbout Red, scolded by his boss and mocked by his co-workers. So, in the middle of a nervous breakdown and his wife regretting the fact that she didn&#039;t marry an extremely rich Leonard Fox when she had the chance, our hero decides to build a time machine and get it right.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
