                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/2003">Season 2003</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2003E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575790">
                                    Destino
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>June 2, 2003</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>A poetic take on love and time.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575790">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4575790.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2003E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4576079">
                                    Mickey&#039;s PhilharMagic
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>October 3, 2003</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Stagehand Donald Duck secretly puts on Mickey&#039;s sorcerer&#039;s hat and conducts an anthropomorphic symphony orchestra. But the proceedings go awry when the irascible Donald is sucked into the tuba and taken on a wild fantasy ride through a variety of musical numbers from classic Disney films.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4576079">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/series/78988/episodes/5f55f319a4a57.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                    
                                    </ul>
                            <h3><a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/seasons/official/2004">Season 2004</a></h3>
                <ul class="list-group">
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2004E01</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575791">
                                    Lorenzo
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>March 6, 2004</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Lorenzo, a cat who is overly proud of his high-life and his overly fluffy tail is suddenly challenged when a spell is cast on his tail which give it a life of it&#039;s own.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575791">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4575791.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2004E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575792">
                                    One By One
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>August 31, 2004</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>The film shows a story of children from a South African town flying kites down a hill after one boy is inspired by a colourful feather floating from the sky. The children find materials from places all over the town and produce equally colourful kites. After a walk, they fly the kites and release them into the sky for the ending of the film.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575792">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/series/78988/episodes/5f55673eb940d.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2004E03</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575793">
                                    A Dairy Tale
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>September 14, 2004</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p></p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575793">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/series/78988/episodes/5f5566e2e7e8f.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2004E04</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575800">
                                    The Cat That Looked at a King
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>December 14, 2004</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>Mary Poppins takes two children into a chalk drawing to show a tale about how a cat challenged an intellectually arrogant king. </p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575800">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/series/78988/episodes/5f55664ab1dad.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2004E05</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575795">
                                    Mickey&#039;s Dog-Gone Christmas
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>November 9, 2004</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>&quot;Mickey&#039;s Dog-Gone Christmas&quot; has Mickey Mouse overdoing his living room with lights and decorations. When Pluto wrecks things, Mickey gets mad and sends him to his doghouse. Wrapped up in the superficial display rescue operations, Mickey doesn&#039;t even notice that his upset dog has run away. While Pluto finds himself at the North Pole among Santa&#039;s reindeer, Mickey finally notices his dog is missing and sets off on a journey to find his pal. Beyond the predictable reunion, all of the characters get together for a jolly conclusion. </p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575795">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4575795.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2004E06</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575796">
                                    Donald&#039;s Gift
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>November 9, 2004</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>The irascible duck is getting frustrated by the holiday season. The song &quot;We Wish You a Merry Christmas&quot; has been plaguing Donald, and a reluctant trip to the mall has him hearing the song everywhere, captured in an effective dialogue-less sequence. While in general I think the Donald Duck formula may be pretty thin, this one works fairly well and may be the best portion of the film. </p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575796">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4575796.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2004E07</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575797">
                                    Christmas Maximus
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>November 9, 2004</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>&quot;Christmas Maximus&quot; relies heavily on pop-style singing to vocalize Max&#039;s growing concerns about how his father Goofy&#039;s normally clumsy behavior may ruin things when Max brings home his girlfriend Mona on their break from college. It&#039;s very short (6 minutes), takes a tone quite different from most Goofy/Max cartoons, and will probably fall under either &quot;hokey&quot; or &quot;cute&quot; for you. Pete is noticeably absent from this one, which will disappoint his loyal following.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575797">
                                                <img src="https://artworks.thetvdb.com/banners/episodes/78988/4575797.jpg" class="img-responsive">
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </li>
                                            
                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2004E08</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575798">
                                    Christmas Impossible
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>November 9, 2004</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>&quot;Christmas: Impossible&quot; stars Scrooge McDuck and his nephew triplets Huey, Dewey, and Louie. Acting as their usual mischeivous selves (which riles up their uncle Donald, as usual), the boys get scared that they haven&#039;t been good enough to get the Christmas presents they want. They mail themselves to the North Pole to make sure they&#039;re on Santa&#039;s good list and encounter a number of obstacles before they begin to see the error of their selfish ways.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/4575798">

                                            </a>
                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </li>

Penny&#039;s father watches the events from his lab through a secret camera imbedded in Bolts collar and worries that he cannot save her. Discovering that no man or dog can break into Dr. Calico&#039;s base, he turns to Rhino, who is watching TV in the background. In order to save Penny and Bolt, Rhino is put through the same procedure as Bolt to give him super-powers.</p>

Later they sneak into Santa&rsquo;s office while he is asleep, using their high tech equipment from the previous film. Lanny&rsquo;s expertise at dressing the tree enables them to enter the hidden workshop where they recover the box and escape just in time. Mrs Claus reveals the contents of the box to be the last part of the first toy that Santa ever made, and gives the complete toy back to him as his Christmas Present.</p>

The two pursue Dawson, but the thief uses explosives to cause an avalanche, blocking their path and allowing him to take some sacks of money from a wagon, which may be why Thunderbolt is chasing him. The sheriff thinks Dawson has escaped, but Thunderbolt climbs across the rock pile to continue the chase. In the end, thanks to Thunderbolt, Dawson is nabbed and brought to justice.</p>

                        <li class="list-group-item">
                            <h4 class="list-group-item-heading">
                                <span class="text-muted episode-label">S2017E02</span>
                                <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/6436092">
                                    Olaf&#039;s Frozen Adventure
                                </a>
                            </h4>
                            <ul class="list-inline text-muted">
                                                                    <li>December 14, 2017</li>
                                                                                                                            </ul>
                            <div class="list-group-item-text">
                                <div class="row">
                                    <div class="col-xs-9">
                                        <p>It is the first Christmas season since the gates reopened and Anna and Elsa host a celebration for all of Arendelle. When the townspeople unexpectedly leave early to enjoy their individual holiday customs, the sisters realize they have no family traditions of their own. Elsa laments the fact that because she had isolated herself most of her life, she and Anna were unable to spend time with each other. Olaf decides to look for traditions with Sven&#039;s help.

Olaf&#039;s Frozen Adventure is a 2017 American 3D computer-animated featurette, produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures. It is directed by Kevin Deters and Stevie Wermers, who previously directed the holiday-themed Prep and Landing shorts. The film features the voices of Josh Gad, Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, and Jonathan Groff reprising their roles from the original 2013 film Frozen. It was released in 3D in theaters for a limited time engagement in front of Pixar&#039;s Coco on November 22, 2017.

Olaf&#039;s Frozen Adventure made its television debut on ABC on December 14, 2017.</p>
                                    </div>
                                                                            <div class="col-xs-3">
                                            <a href="/series/disney-animated-shorts/episodes/6436092">
